name: Forest Dice game
description:
ANdroid 8 and more


Dice like game

Card game for spending  time and relax

Game was created for a pleasant pastime.

key feature:

-  Choosing and opening  new  level for points that are given when you win in round and in match

-  Need replay one of the levels to  required number of score 

-  Beautiful characters 

- Purpose of the game collect the maximum score 

- Magic button get score. get 20 scores after seing reklama
